First Posts

  • Read Websites for you and your projects.

Update Author Attributes

In _config.yml remember to specify your own data:

title : My Blog =)

author :
  name : Name Lastname
  email : blah@email.test
  github : username
  twitter : username

The theme should reference these variables whenever needed.

Sample Posts

This blog contains sample posts which help stage pages and blog data. When you don’t need the samples anymore just delete the _posts/core-samples folder.

$ rm -rf _posts/core-samples

Here’s a sample “posts list”.

  • 18 Nov 2013 » 改变raspberrypi电脑名称
  • 15 Nov 2013 » 分布式虚拟开发环境工具vagrant
  • 15 Nov 2013 » Hello World
  • 29 Dec 2011 » Jekyll Introduction

Quick Commands

git clone https://github.com/cnruby/cnruby.github.com
bundle install
bundle update github-pages
bundle exec jekyll serve --watch --incremental
open http://127.0.0.1:4000/
